page.title: 09RELIGION IN MARLBOROUGH
page.content: The churches of Marlborough have covenanted to form an ecumenical parish, and to do nothing separately that could be done together. The team is (Anglican) Rev. Canon W.Down, Team Rector; Rev. M.Cripps, Priest Assistant of St. Mary's Church; Rev. Colin Fox (Team Vicar of Preshute and Mildenhall) Rev. R.Marsh and Rev. D.Dales (Chaplain and Assistant Chaplain of Marlborough College); Rev. G.Gordon, Minister of Christchurch (Methodist and Reformed Church) and Father T.Kelly, Parish Priest of St. Thomas More (R.C.). The team works closely with the Society of Friends, and the covenanted members renew their covenant annually. It is interesting to note that St. Peter's church in the High St. (now deconsecrated )is the church in which Cardinal Wolsey was ordained.
